document_data.name: Ebonhawk
document_data.mainbody: '''Ebonhawk''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]] of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon annual/2000/After the Dragon: The Kingdom of Cormyr Today|66}}
document_data.Base: The Ebonhawks were based in the [[Warmshores]] region, which had been newly established as of [[1371 DR]]. This was an area of hills west of [[Suzail]] on the coast of the [[Dragonmere]], at the western border of Cormyr.
document_data.Activities: They raised crops vital to the kingdom in the early 1370s DR.
